Artemis:

Artemis stopped in front of a built and TRansformed in robot form.
"Here's the place where I have my quarters"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::JetV::
> JetV peels out through the hall following Artemis.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Artemis:
> >
> > She transformed in a futurisc silver car "Then... lets go"
> >
> > and she ran towards her quarters
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > > ::JetV::
> > > "No problem" he said transforming into a small ATV.
> > > "Shall we 'ROLL OUT'"
> > >
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > > > Artemis:
> > > > " Thanks JetV" replied Artemis "You're so kind to help my with
> > that"
> > > >   ----- Original Message -----
> > > >   From: gunthers8@n...
> > > >   To: nbwrpg@y...
> > > >   Sent: Wednesday, May 16, 2001 9:55 PM
> > > >   Subject: Re: The Autobot Council
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >   ::JetV::
> > > >   JetV looks to TrailBlazer and shakes his head. He then 
turns to
> > > >   Artemis and smiles.
> > > >   "If you want I can go help you get your stuff and show you 
to
> > the
> > > >   ship. It'll be nice to have another scout with me. Get's 
kinda
> > lonely
> > > >   out there by yourself."
> > > >
> > > >   --- In nbwrpg@y..., trailblazerbw@y... wrote:
> > > >   > ---Trailblazer---
> > > >   >
> > > >   > Trailblazer returns the look and sais "I don't know, 
somewere
> > that
> > > >   > way ??"
> > > >   > (I don't know so make somme thing up.)
> > > >   >
> > > >   >
> > > >   > --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > >   > > Artemis:
> > > >   > >
> > > >   > > Artemis looked to TrailBlazer and with a smile 
said "Nice
> > to meet
> > > >   > > you... I'll go for my things -where is the ship?"
> > > >   > >
> > > >   > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > > >   > > > OOC: LOL Pacifix hadn't entered the room yet, Jer. =) 
Oh
> > > well heh
> > > >   > > >
> > > >   > > > --- Pacifix ---
> > > >   > > >
> > > >   > > > Pacifix bows respectfully when he enters, he scans 
all of
> > the
> > > >   > > > Council present as his head rises back to level. He
> > listens
> > > >   > > intently
> > > >   > > > to Ironhide's speech. He is silent as he takes in the
> > unsettling
> > > >   > > > information. He approaches the Speakers podium, 
clears his
> > > throat
> > > >   > > > and begins his speech, "I, I am ready to accept your
> > charge to
> > > >   > me.
> > > >   > > > I feel that I have trained long for this task, and 
will
> > > strive to
> > > >   > > > complete it as diplomatically as possible," he
> > sighs, "but I
> > > >   > doubt
> > > >   > > > that the possibility of a quiet end will ever occur." 
He
> > pauses
> > > >   > for
> > > >   > > > measure, "I have almost completed the selectioning
> > process. I
> > > >   > > > have chosen up till this time: Jazz, JetV, Crossroads,
> > > >   > Trailblazer,
> > > >   > > > Metalwarhawk, Gold bug, and just recently, Artemis. 
All
> > of these
> > > >   > > > bots I feel are suited for the mission, and their 
skills
> > > would be
> > > >   > > vital
> > > >   > > > to our success. Do any council members disagree with 
my
> > > >   > > > choices?" Pacifix steps down to await the Council.
> > > >   > > >
> > > >   > > >
> > > >   > > >
> > > >   > > >
> > > >   > > > On 15 May 2001, at 18:51, robertdahl wrote:
> > > >   > > >
> > > >   > > > > OOC: Okay everyone, I am really letting the creative
> > juices
> > > >   > flow
> > > >   > > here.
> > > >   > > > > If some of this dosent work with your characters or
> > stories in
> > > >   > the
> > > >   > > > > RPG, just say that it is a different time than which
> > your
> > > >   > > character
> > > >   > > > > came from. :) Also all the Autobots in this scene 
have
> > been
> > > >   > remade
> > > >   > > > > smaller for fuel reasons. Also for a note, Ironhide 
has
> > been
> > > >   > > remade
> > > >   > > > > from the Matrix, and due to his history, he is one 
of
> > the main
> > > >   > > > > characters.  Here we go.
> > > >   > > > >
> > > >   > > > >
> > > >   > > > > BIC:
> > > >   > > > > The massive iron doors Pacifix walks up too open up,
> > the gears
> > > >   > > > > grinding, and it leads into an enormous chambre, 
well
> > light by
> > > >   > > energon
> > > >   > > > > powered lights. The room is a large dome, with many
> > chairs and
> > > >   > > tables
> > > >   > > > > where a hundred Autobots sit. Most of the Autobots 
were
> > given
> > > >   > this
> > > >   > > > > high privelage for the name they made during one of 
the
> > great
> > > >   > > wars.
> > > >   > > > > Painted all over are the symbols of Maximal, 
Predacon,
> > and
> > > >   > > Autobot. In
> > > >   > > > > the centre, over the highest stand, is a large 
image of
> > the
> > > >   > > Autobots
> > > >   > > > > greatest Hero, Optimus Prime. All along the walls 
there
> > are
> > > >   > > pictures
> > > >   > > > > of legends who have ceased to exist, and died for 
the
> > cause.
> > > >   > > Brawn's
> > > >   > > > > face is at one end, Ratchet and Prowl at another,
> > Ironhide at
> > > >   > one
> > > >   > > > > corner, surrounded by many Autobots that preexist 
them.
> > One
> > > >   > > though,
> > > >   > > > > that is very famous, Alpha Trion. In the centre of 
all
> > the
> > > >   > > podiums is
> > > >   > > > > an energon fountain. It harmoneusly gushes a soft 
pink
> > energy,
> > > >   > > that
> > > >   > > > > gives the room a light pink colour.
> > > >   > > > >
> > > >   > > > > There is a large hush over the crowd, as a red old
> > Autobot, at
> > > >   > > the top
> > > >   > > > > and centre of the room stands up. He then begins to
> > speak, and
> > > >   > the
> > > >   > > > > other Autobots follow his every word. "Greetings
> > Pacifix" he
> > > >   > says
> > > >   > > in a
> > > >   > > > > rough deep voice. The Autobot Ironhide's voice can 
be
> > heard by
> > > >   > > all. He
> > > >   > > > > speaks with wisdom, and kind words. To his right and
> > left,
> > > >   > > standing
> > > >   > > > > behind him are Sunstreaker and Sideswipe, his body
> > guards. To
> > > >   > his
> > > >   > > > > right sitting down is his peer, the old Autobot 
known
> > as Kup,
> > > >   > who
> > > >   > > > > watches all of this with an unussually sense of
> > calmness.
> > > >   > Beside
> > > >   > > him
> > > >   > > > > is the once human, now robot Spike. A few more
> > recognizable
> > > >   > > Autobots
> > > >   > > > > sit around. "As you know" Ironhide continues, "We 
have
> > finally
> > > >   > > > > achieved what we set out to millions of years ago.
> > Peace" he
> > > >   > says,
> > > >   > > > > every robot in the room nodding at the last 
word. "But
> > it
> > > is an
> > > >   > > uneasy
> > > >   > > > > peace, for even though we have all but stopped the
> > > Decepticons,
> > > >   > we
> > > >   > > > > have reasons to believe their decendants, the 
Predacons,
> > > do not
> > > >   > > follow
> > > >   > > > > this peace willfully" he says in a grave tone. "We 
even
> > have
> > > >   > > strong
> > > >   > > > > evidence that points to the fact that they have 
released
> > > >   > > Decepticon
> > > >   > > > > war Criminals from confinment, to try to change 
time on
> > the
> > > >   > planet
> > > >   > > > > Earth" he says, thinking back to that time, four
> > million years
> > > >   > > ago,
> > > >   > > > > when the Ark, and Nemesis crash landed on the 
planet,
> > bringing
> > > >   > to
> > > >   > > it
> > > >   > > > > their million year Strugle. He remembers the battles
> > they had
> > > >   > > there,
> > > >   > > > > and how it helped turn the tide of War for the
> > Autobots. "We
> > > >   > sent
> > > >   > > a
> > > >   > > > > scouting ship to earth already, with two Autobot
> > Veterans.
> > > They
> > > >   > > have
> > > >   > > > > not made contact with us however, and their ship is 
not
> > > >   > emmiting a
> > > >   > > > > signal. We fear the Predacons may be on to us. That 
is
> > why we
> > > >   > have
> > > >   > > > > summoned you Pacifix. The Predacons will not notice 
if a
> > > rookie
> > > >   > > > > commander goes missing, but we have reason to 
believe
> > you are
> > > >   > the
> > > >   > > > > perfect leader for this mission. We also know that 
one
> > of your
> > > >   > > friends
> > > >   > > > > was in that scout ship, and understand you will most
> > likely
> > > >   > want
> > > >   > > to
> > > >   > > > > retrieve him. We have faith in your Pacifist 
reasoning,
> > and
> > > >   > think
> > > >   > > you
> > > >   > > > > would best represent us. We have already selected a 
few
> > > Autobot
> > > >   > > > > veterans to go with you, and we understand you are 
also
> > > putting
> > > >   > a
> > > >   > > crew
> > > >   > > > > of you own together" Ironhide says, pausing for 
Pacifix
> > to
> > > >   > > respond.
